summary: JuSt A nOrMaL tUtOrInG dAy part 44
title: JuSt A nOrMaL tUtOrInG dAy part 44
body:
*Same scene*

Clint: Okay let me get this straight

Clint: You’re not dating Eugene??

Peter: Of course not! I thought I already told you before!

Clint: In my defense you seemed really flustered so I kinda thought you where covering it up 

Flash: Why does everyone think i’m gay??

M.J: Because you are, dipshit

Peter: M.J can you stop insulting Flash for one second please?

*All the Avenger sprint down the hallway*

Gwen: The fuck is happening here?

Steve: Peter, you brought your friends over?

Peter: You weren’t supposed to find out

Peter: These are most of the decathlon team, and Wanda

Wanda: Yeah!

Natasha: And who’s the guy grabbing you by the waist?

Harry: *Let’s go of Peter* Harry Osborn, Peter’s boyfriend!

Tony: *Having flashbacks* OSBORN!!!!!!!!!!!

Peter: *Glaring at Harry* Now you want to flirt with me? 

Harry: If it means i’m embarrassing you, i’ll do it   

Peter: *Softly but with power* Bitch

title: jordan’s 5k celebration!
body:
hi everyone!

so as most of you know, i recently hit 5k followers (which i mean, holy shit thank you so fucking much). in a way of saying thank you for all the support and love, i’m hosting a celebration!

so, feel free to send in…

🌻 blurb/imagine requests

🌕 moodboard requests

🌙 au requests (ex. dad!tom, boxer!tom, etc.)

☀️ song based imagine/blurb requests (ex. imagine based off the song ‘goodnight n go by ariana grande’, etc.)

⭐️ and anything else you guys can think of!

i’ll be answering as many asks as i can, however i’m sick so please bare with me lmao

thank you guys so much for all fo the love, there’s never a day in my life where i’m not thankful to have all this amazing support for all of you. you all mean so much to me and i truly never thought i would hit a number like this on this platform. thank you, from the bottom of my heart.

i’m also tagging some of my lovely mutuals under the cut, i love you all and thank you for supporting me and this blog for so long. there’s no way i could’ve done it without you lovely people by my side. lots and lots of love to all of you. ❤️🧡💞💗💜💖

@lovesickbill @sunshinehollandd @emmaewatson @starksparker @parkerrogersgirl @anxieteandbiscuits 💜💜

title: Black Wave//Chapter One
body:
Not My GIF

Pairing: Peter Parker x Villain!Reader

Summary: For as long as they can remember Y/N has been part of the criminal organization, Black Wave. It isn’t until they meet Spider-Man that their life changes for the better.

Parts: Prologue I Chapter One I Chapter Two I Chapter Three

Warnings: mentions of murder, attempted murder, swearing, stalking, fighting

A/N: Sooo first part! I’ll probably update much less frequently, especially since this chapter was already halfway written when i posted the prologue

Hours of stakeout stiffened Y/N’s muscles like iron cables. Brutal winds threatened to crack their resolve, but they stood firm on the roof of the marketplace. Finger artfully coiled over the trigger, ready to shoot should the famed web-slinger cross their path. Weeks of planning went into this, hours spent tracking the hero’s path across the city. And every single day, he’d cross this one street. Once at the beginning of his patrol, and again at the end.

Y/N assumed that this street was where the boy lived. But they believed it would be better to shoot him in costume. It would make a stronger statement, Y/N was theatrical like that. What shattered the hopes of millions more than the death of a hero? Would a random boy dead in his apartment accomplish the same thing? No.

The distant sound of web shooters alerted Y/N to his approach. They cocked the gun, and aimed exactly where his head would be. Just a few more seconds, five to be exact.

Five, they exhaled, preparing for the shot.

Four, they could hear the exclamations of people on the street below. “Look! It’s Spider-Man!”

Three, they could hear him approaching. The sound of web fluid exiting his shooters becoming louder, and louder.

Two, they could see him now. The light from street lamps illuminating him eerily.

One, he was right where they needed him to be.

They pulled the trigger, watching triumphantly as the bullet rushed towards him. He quickly turned, he had anticipated the shot. His gut warning him of the attacker. Shooting upwards, he pulled himself out of the way of the approaching bullet. Letting it crash uselessly into the neighboring building.

“Fuck,” Y/N cursed. They never believed that the first attempt would yield any results, but they were so close.

And now Spider-Man was alerted to their presence. They darted behind a concrete wall. Hastily packing their weapons and double checking to ensure their mask was in place, confirming it was still covering the skin below their nose. The mask was decorated with the red and black webbed pattern that Spider-Man so famously sported. A bitter taste of irony, more theatrics on Y/N’s part.

They had no intention of going toe-to-toe with Spider-Man. Not that they couldn’t hold their own, but there was a risk of capture, and a risk that their employers would be compromised. A risk they weren’t willing to take.

With everything in order they slung the bag containing the gun over their shoulder, sneaking carefully over to the fire escape. Spider-Man had just recovered his bearings and was now examining the building carefully, head pivoting as his eyes narrowed and enlarged mechanically.

Suddenly, he froze, he had spotted movement. Y/N’s heart pounded as the fight-or-flight instinct kicked in, rooting them in place on the off chance he’d move on

It was no use.

Spider-Man swung over and landed gracefully in front of Y/N. Examining them with interest.

“I see you stole my look,” he commented, nodding at their mask.

“Who’s to say that I wasn’t first?”  They fired back. Casually sliding their hand over to their hip, and tossing the bag aside.

“You got me there,” he answered, putting his hands up as if to surrender, but instead firing a round of webs at the assassin.

Y/N was smarter than that. They dodged the webs effortlessly and pulled out the concealed knife that was hidden on their thigh.

“Pretty smart, Spider-Boy, trying to distract me with banter.”

“It’s Spider-Man,” he answered indignantly.

“I’m sorry, but your voice makes it seem as if you haven’t even hit puberty yet. You may want to modify it.”

“I already am,” he muttered.

“A pity,” Y/N answered. Swinging their knife as he was preoccupied, managing to tear away a bit of fabric. “Sometimes technology fails us, hm?”

“Ha ha, very funny,” Spider-Man grumbled. Shifting into a fighting stance. “Would you be so kind as to tell me why you just tried to shoot me?”

“Why of course, young sir,” they replied haughtily. Blocking Spider-Man’s punches and throwing a kick, which he blocked as well, grabbing their leg and throwing them aside. “I just really don’t like you.”

“Really?” He said, shocked.

“You actually believe me?” Y/N laughed. They rose to their feet, and managed to get a few punches in before he could react. They elbowed his kidney and smirked as he curled into himself in pain. Their eyes visibly lighting up with held in laughter.

He soon recovered and drove his knee into Y/N’s stomach, winding them. As they stumbled, he anchored them to the ground with his webs.

“Maybe next time, pick fights with people you can actually win against,” he teased, reaching up to rip away Y/N’s mask.

“Actually,” Y/N began, before they were engulfed in flames. The web fluid melting away in the extreme heat. “I think I pick fights just fine.”

“How?” He stuttered before Y/N mercilessly shot waves of flame at him.

“I have my ways,” Y/N smirked. Commanding the flame to extinguish and shuddering as ice seemed to flood through their once fiery veins.

They checked to make sure their mask survived the blaze, and after confirming its presence, they approached the collapsed figure of Spider-Man.

“It’s at this point I wonder why I don’t just start with that,” Y/N mused as they pinned the hero to the ground. “But I doubt it matters to you. You would end up dead either way.”

They rose their arm up in the air, preparing to plunge the knife down into his chest.

“P-please,” he gasped. Fear resonating in his voice. “Don’t do this.”

“Sorry kid, I don’t have much of a choice,” they swung down the knife, but the sound of a repulsor firing up interrupted them.

Y/N clutched the fallen hero and rolled, narrowly avoiding the energy blast fired off by the Iron Man suit that was directly behind them.

They jumped back to their feet and held the boy in front of them like a shield. Pressing the blade painfully against his windpipe.

“Don’t move!” They shouted, “don’t move or I slice his throat!”

Y/N prayed that the suit was not just an AI, but in fact remotely controlled. Tony Stark would be more likely to listen to their demands than a cold and calculating machine.

Seconds ticked by as the suit planned it’s next move.  Y/N breathed a sigh of relief as they watched the suit falter and lower it’s outstretched arm.

“Alright, alright, take it easy,” the suit said mechanically, “just let him go.”

Y/N backed towards the ledge, teetering on the edge of the building. They weren’t too high up, but falling would hurt like hell. But if they were unlucky it’d be fatal.

“I’m not going to drop my little friend here,” Y/N answered. Hoping that no other suits were on the way, “you’ll shoot me as soon as I do so.”  

“It doesn’t matter,” the suit called back, “you’re seconds away from being surrounded.”

Y/N steeled their nerves in preparation for what they were about to do. They loosened their grip on Spider-Man and pushed him forward, and at the same time jumped backwards off the building.

Time slowed to a crawl. The air grew hot and dry as blasts of energy flew overhead, missing them by inches. Panic began to sink in as their stomach swooped from beneath them.

But something broke their fall, a thin string of webbing caught to the very tips of their fingers.

“I’m not letting you get away!” Spider-Man shouted from above, pulling Y/N upwards.

“Don’t worry, Spider-Boy!” Y/N yelled back, “you’ll see me again!”

“What’s that supposed to mean?”

Y/N didn’t answer. They shot the web with a concentrated blast of fire, the material breaking in less than a second.

Everything slowed down once again. Spider-Man’s shout of frustration drowned out by Y/N’a pulse filling their ears. Faced with capture, which we may as well replace with death, Y/N improvised.

They shot fire from their hands and feet. Imitating the Iron Man suit they saw just seconds before. Their rapid descent slowed until they were hovering only a few feet above a ground.

“Fuck yeah,” Y/N cheered before letting themselves drop to the street below. Blending in with the crowd as they fled.

Five, they exhaled, preparing for the shot.

Four, they could hear the exclamations of people on the street below. “Look! It’s Spider-Man!”

Three, they could hear him approaching. The sound of web fluid exiting his shooters becoming louder, and louder.

Two, they could see him now. The light from street lamps illuminating him eerily.

One, he was right where they needed him to be.

They pulled the trigger, watching triumphantly as the bullet rushed towards him. He quickly turned, he had anticipated the shot. His gut warning him of the attacker. Shooting upwards, he pulled himself out of the way of the approaching bullet. Letting it crash uselessly into the neighboring building.

“Fuck,” Y/N cursed. They never believed that the first attempt would yield any results, but they were so close.

And now Spider-Man was alerted to their presence. They darted behind a concrete wall. Hastily packing their weapons and double checking to ensure their mask was in place, confirming it was still covering the skin below their nose. The mask was decorated with the red and black webbed pattern that Spider-Man so famously sported. A bitter taste of irony, more theatrics on Y/N’s part.

They had no intention of going toe-to-toe with Spider-Man. Not that they couldn’t hold their own, but there was a risk of capture, and a risk that their employers would be compromised. A risk they weren’t willing to take.

With everything in order they slung the bag containing the gun over their shoulder, sneaking carefully over to the fire escape. Spider-Man had just recovered his bearings and was now examining the building carefully, head pivoting as his eyes narrowed and enlarged mechanically.

Suddenly, he froze, he had spotted movement. Y/N’s heart pounded as the fight-or-flight instinct kicked in, rooting them in place on the off chance he’d move on

It was no use.

Spider-Man swung over and landed gracefully in front of Y/N. Examining them with interest.

“I see you stole my look,” he commented, nodding at their mask.

“Who’s to say that I wasn’t first?”  They fired back. Casually sliding their hand over to their hip, and tossing the bag aside.

“You got me there,” he answered, putting his hands up as if to surrender, but instead firing a round of webs at the assassin.

Y/N was smarter than that. They dodged the webs effortlessly and pulled out the concealed knife that was hidden on their thigh.

“Pretty smart, Spider-Boy, trying to distract me with banter.”

“It’s Spider-Man,” he answered indignantly.

“I’m sorry, but your voice makes it seem as if you haven’t even hit puberty yet. You may want to modify it.”

“I already am,” he muttered.

“A pity,” Y/N answered. Swinging their knife as he was preoccupied, managing to tear away a bit of fabric. “Sometimes technology fails us, hm?”

“Ha ha, very funny,” Spider-Man grumbled. Shifting into a fighting stance. “Would you be so kind as to tell me why you just tried to shoot me?”

“Why of course, young sir,” they replied haughtily. Blocking Spider-Man’s punches and throwing a kick, which he blocked as well, grabbing their leg and throwing them aside. “I just really don’t like you.”

“Really?” He said, shocked.

“You actually believe me?” Y/N laughed. They rose to their feet, and managed to get a few punches in before he could react. They elbowed his kidney and smirked as he curled into himself in pain. Their eyes visibly lighting up with held in laughter.

He soon recovered and drove his knee into Y/N’s stomach, winding them. As they stumbled, he anchored them to the ground with his webs.

“Maybe next time, pick fights with people you can actually win against,” he teased, reaching up to rip away Y/N’s mask.

“Actually,” Y/N began, before they were engulfed in flames. The web fluid melting away in the extreme heat. “I think I pick fights just fine.”

“How?” He stuttered before Y/N mercilessly shot waves of flame at him.

“I have my ways,” Y/N smirked. Commanding the flame to extinguish and shuddering as ice seemed to flood through their once fiery veins.

They checked to make sure their mask survived the blaze, and after confirming its presence, they approached the collapsed figure of Spider-Man.

“It’s at this point I wonder why I don’t just start with that,” Y/N mused as they pinned the hero to the ground. “But I doubt it matters to you. You would end up dead either way.”

They rose their arm up in the air, preparing to plunge the knife down into his chest.

“P-please,” he gasped. Fear resonating in his voice. “Don’t do this.”

“Sorry kid, I don’t have much of a choice,” they swung down the knife, but the sound of a repulsor firing up interrupted them.

Y/N clutched the fallen hero and rolled, narrowly avoiding the energy blast fired off by the Iron Man suit that was directly behind them.

They jumped back to their feet and held the boy in front of them like a shield. Pressing the blade painfully against his windpipe.

“Don’t move!” They shouted, “don’t move or I slice his throat!”

Y/N prayed that the suit was not just an AI, but in fact remotely controlled. Tony Stark would be more likely to listen to their demands than a cold and calculating machine.

Seconds ticked by as the suit planned it’s next move.  Y/N breathed a sigh of relief as they watched the suit falter and lower it’s outstretched arm.

“Alright, alright, take it easy,” the suit said mechanically, “just let him go.”

Y/N backed towards the ledge, teetering on the edge of the building. They weren’t too high up, but falling would hurt like hell. But if they were unlucky it’d be fatal.

“I’m not going to drop my little friend here,” Y/N answered. Hoping that no other suits were on the way, “you’ll shoot me as soon as I do so.”  

“It doesn’t matter,” the suit called back, “you’re seconds away from being surrounded.”

Y/N steeled their nerves in preparation for what they were about to do. They loosened their grip on Spider-Man and pushed him forward, and at the same time jumped backwards off the building.

Time slowed to a crawl. The air grew hot and dry as blasts of energy flew overhead, missing them by inches. Panic began to sink in as their stomach swooped from beneath them.

But something broke their fall, a thin string of webbing caught to the very tips of their fingers.

“I’m not letting you get away!” Spider-Man shouted from above, pulling Y/N upwards.

“Don’t worry, Spider-Boy!” Y/N yelled back, “you’ll see me again!”

“What’s that supposed to mean?”

Y/N didn’t answer. They shot the web with a concentrated blast of fire, the material breaking in less than a second.

Everything slowed down once again. Spider-Man’s shout of frustration drowned out by Y/N’a pulse filling their ears. Faced with capture, which we may as well replace with death, Y/N improvised.

They shot fire from their hands and feet. Imitating the Iron Man suit they saw just seconds before. Their rapid descent slowed until they were hovering only a few feet above a ground.

“Fuck yeah,” Y/N cheered before letting themselves drop to the street below. Blending in with the crowd as they fled.

title: My Home (Part 14)
body:
Peter Parker x Reader

Part 14… Y/n Y/ln

Word count: 1.51 k words

A/n: Tell me if you want to get added to the TAGLIST of My Home! For more parts see ‘MASTERLIST’ in my profile description! Taglist in the reblogged post. Tell me if you wanna get added :)

I noticed our position as I felt a knot forming in my stomach as his eyes were darting from my eyes to my lips. He was so close, I felt his breath hit my lips.

That kiss with Peter replayed in my mind over and over again… I felt extremely restless, as I repeatedly tossed and turned around in my bed, squinting my eyes in the hope to sleep, but failed miserably.

The way his lips felt so soft on mine. The way his hands rested on my waist, pulling me closer. The taste of his lips. His soft curls falling on his face.
I can’t stop thinking about him…

I was soaked in sweat.
I blinked open my eyes, instantly got out of my covers, grabbing a bottle of water, gulping it, pacifying my throat that felt dry like it was choked of ash. I checked the time on my phone, It was just 9 pm.

My plan of trying to sleep and ignore everything that happened today didn’t go that well.

After all,… I just realized,… that I have feelings for him. Seriouly why didn’t I noticed till yet. Maybe… Maybe because I already had him by my side and didn’t feel the urgency to make a move cause I never fucking thought of romance in my life..! Stuck in this alien planet was already too much distraction and now Peter Benjamin Parker!

How can’t anyone not fall for a pure soul like him?

Apart from the time, I saw one more thing on my phone screen - notifications.

[You have 6 missed calls and 31 unread messages from ‘Peter the dumbo’ - Click for details.]

I swallowed a lump that formed in my throat and clicked to see the messages.

—

Peter the dumbo(06:15 pm)

P~ Y/n r u fine? 

P~ You left all of a sudden, making me worried.

P~ Plz answer my texts.

P~ R u there?


Peter the dumbo(07:03 pm)

P~ I’m really sorry for what happened today. 

P~ If you don’t want anything between us, I will totally forget everything.

P~ Please I’m sorry. 

P~ Don’t ignore me y/n, plz. 

P~ I’m an idiot y/n, but plz answer.

P~ I never thought it would make u that uncomfortable.

P~ I’m sorry.

P~ Plz answer……!!!!!


Peter the dumbo(08:09 pm)

P~ Y/n

P~ Plz contact me. Plz…!

P~ I came to your house, but your windows were locked and covered with blinds.

P~ I’m sorry for stalking you.

P~ But I’m seriously worried.

P~ Plz Y/n, I’m sorry. 

P~ Seeing you so close to me drove me crazy. 

P~ I was madly in love with you.

P~ I was falling for you each and every day.

P~ I couldn’t stop thinking about you. 

P~ Every word you said, your thoughts, you being so smart, so humble, so caring, so cute, so gorgeous, your smile, your laugh, your weird jokes, your eyes, everything about you made me feel hanker sored.

P~ Meeting and spending time with you daily made everything worse.

P~ I’m totally ok with u not feeling the same. 

P~ But plz don’t ignore me

P~ I promise I will forget everything, every feeling I had for you, but plz don’t be mad at me. And I’m sorry to say all this through ests, but it’s fore easier than confronting you face to face.

P~ I guess you were right I’m a dumbo.

P~ Plz, don’t ignore me. 

P~ We will again be just friends, I won’t ever make you uncomfortable again. 

P~ Plz answer me y/n.

P~ I’ll be waiting for your answer.

—

Oh god, what have I done?! I should be the one saying sorry not him! He’s still the one caring. Of course, I love him back, but I can’t cheat him by telling lies. I should text him, or rather I should meet him and tell him the exact truth. I will explain everything to him, I am not the same person now, I am changed, also I didn’t even do anything willingly, I was obligated to do it. Also, I actually haven’t really succeeded in it, so Peter will understand… or at least I hope so.

I wiped away the tears that had fallen from my eyes involuntary while reading those messages. I quickly opened my keyboard and replied to his messages.

—

Peter the dumbo(09:21 pm)

Y/N~ I’m absolutely fine

Y/N~  I should be the one apologizing,
not you 

P~ Thank god Y/n, ur okay!

P~ But wait, an apology? For what? I was the one being a perv.

Y/N~  Just meet me at the park near the school in 10 min. I can’t tell u here, plz just come to the park. And u r absolutely not a perv. Just get there.

P~ OK

—

I put my phone down and climbed out the window so that no one would know that I was leaving. With my full potential, I flew towards the park at a high altitude so that people wouldn’t notice me. I landed behind a bush in the park and took a seat on the bench. The park was completely vacant, maybe because it’s 09:26 pm, I groaned looking at the time. I came here in just 3 minutes, gotta wait some more minutes for Peter to come. I was tapping my feet restlessly, checking the time almost every second. Seems foolish, but what am I supposed to do? I heard some sort of noise behind my back, like a buzzing sound. I turned back to see a drone. I instantly stood up horrified. It wasn’t a normal remote control drone, it was from my planet, the patterns engraved in its outer body clearly proved that. The drone flew and stopped in front of me, radiating a blue coloured light, and in a flash, a human hologram was displayed in front of my eyes.

“Jo…… Jonah?!?!” my tongue-tied, making me bereft of speech, seeing that figure standing in front of me.
“Seems like you were expecting someone else…” he puzzled, noticing me being not glad seeing his hologram.
“Ah… It’s just the first time I’ve seen you after a lot of years, so… it’s really g-great” I tried to develop a little fake smile.
“Is it so?!” He said, sounding unsatisfied by my words. I squinted my eyes and raised an eyebrow, trying to pretend that I was unable to understand what he was saying, which was not actually the case. I heard another sound behind the bushes, but I couldn’t see anyone there.
“I hope, you haven’t forgotten the tasks you were assigned to do?!” He questioned me diplomatically, making me look at his hologram again.
“Huh?! Uh..?! Wh-what are you trying to say?” I fretted, stammering at every word, fake giggling at the end of the sentence as I slid the ring into my jacket’s pocket hiding it from the view of his holographic cameras.

“The Queen has given you enough time already, I’m afraid she won’t give you any more. Why haven’t you contacted us, for 4 years?”

“My transponder broke when I came here, so I was unable to contact you” the only genuine thing I said till now to Jonah.
“But wait,… Queen?” I hesitated.
“Yes, Princess Dorothea is now the crowned Queen and she won’t be happy to know that you failed in getting the Ring!”

“I-I will try my best to get it really soon”

“Do it fast, because she’s coming to see you and you definitely don’t want to see their heads chopped”

“Yeah, Yeah, I will get it for her. Just ensure me you won’t hurt them”, I pleaded.

He didn’t reply and his holographic illusion turned off and that drone flew off.

She’s coming for me.
I’ll have to give Dorothea that Ring.

I felt some hustle in the bush behind me. I turned to see Peter. He removed his mask, walking towards me.
“Pe… ”
“What the hell was that Y/n? You lied?! You are working for that person, you said you were against?! ” He chastised. His voice was so loud, I had never heard him so rough. He was hell angry.
“I-I,… listen, Peter, I wanted to tell you, that’s why I called you and… ”
“Come on Y/n, what did you expect?! I was an idiot, I believed you before Fury or Dr Strange. I challenged them that you were right?!” He had tears in his eyes.
“Please Peter, I was trying to protect my planet.” I tried to explain.
“How? How are you protecting the planet by giving that Ring to HER?! Tell me the truth! The complete, whole truth!” He demanded, wearing his mask again.
“Okay,… I will tell you the truth, all of it” I responded, wearing the ring again, flying to a place devoid of any human interference and he too did swing to an abandoned building roof following me.

I was planning on explaining things to him calmly, but… It’s even worse.

I was soaked in sweat.
I blinked open my eyes, instantly got out of my covers, grabbing a bottle of water, gulping it, pacifying my throat that felt dry like it was choked of ash. I checked the time on my phone, It was just 9 pm.

My plan of trying to sleep and ignore everything that happened today didn’t go that well.

After all,… I just realized,… that I have feelings for him. Seriouly why didn’t I noticed till yet. Maybe… Maybe because I already had him by my side and didn’t feel the urgency to make a move cause I never fucking thought of romance in my life..! Stuck in this alien planet was already too much distraction and now Peter Benjamin Parker!

How can’t anyone not fall for a pure soul like him?

Apart from the time, I saw one more thing on my phone screen - notifications.

[You have 6 missed calls and 31 unread messages from ‘Peter the dumbo’ - Click for details.]

I swallowed a lump that formed in my throat and clicked to see the messages.

—

Peter the dumbo(06:15 pm)

P~ Y/n r u fine? 

P~ You left all of a sudden, making me worried.

P~ Plz answer my texts.

P~ R u there?


Peter the dumbo(07:03 pm)

P~ I’m really sorry for what happened today. 

P~ If you don’t want anything between us, I will totally forget everything.

P~ Please I’m sorry. 

P~ Don’t ignore me y/n, plz. 

P~ I’m an idiot y/n, but plz answer.

P~ I never thought it would make u that uncomfortable.

P~ I’m sorry.

P~ Plz answer……!!!!!


Peter the dumbo(08:09 pm)

P~ Y/n

P~ Plz contact me. Plz…!

P~ I came to your house, but your windows were locked and covered with blinds.

P~ I’m sorry for stalking you.

P~ But I’m seriously worried.

P~ Plz Y/n, I’m sorry. 

P~ Seeing you so close to me drove me crazy. 

P~ I was madly in love with you.

P~ I was falling for you each and every day.

P~ I couldn’t stop thinking about you. 

P~ Every word you said, your thoughts, you being so smart, so humble, so caring, so cute, so gorgeous, your smile, your laugh, your weird jokes, your eyes, everything about you made me feel hanker sored.

P~ Meeting and spending time with you daily made everything worse.

P~ I’m totally ok with u not feeling the same. 

P~ But plz don’t ignore me

P~ I promise I will forget everything, every feeling I had for you, but plz don’t be mad at me. And I’m sorry to say all this through ests, but it’s fore easier than confronting you face to face.

P~ I guess you were right I’m a dumbo.

P~ Plz, don’t ignore me. 

P~ We will again be just friends, I won’t ever make you uncomfortable again. 

P~ Plz answer me y/n.

P~ I’ll be waiting for your answer.

—

Oh god, what have I done?! I should be the one saying sorry not him! He’s still the one caring. Of course, I love him back, but I can’t cheat him by telling lies. I should text him, or rather I should meet him and tell him the exact truth. I will explain everything to him, I am not the same person now, I am changed, also I didn’t even do anything willingly, I was obligated to do it. Also, I actually haven’t really succeeded in it, so Peter will understand… or at least I hope so.

I wiped away the tears that had fallen from my eyes involuntary while reading those messages. I quickly opened my keyboard and replied to his messages.

—

Peter the dumbo(09:21 pm)

Y/N~ I’m absolutely fine

Y/N~  I should be the one apologizing,
not you 

P~ Thank god Y/n, ur okay!

P~ But wait, an apology? For what? I was the one being a perv.

Y/N~  Just meet me at the park near the school in 10 min. I can’t tell u here, plz just come to the park. And u r absolutely not a perv. Just get there.

P~ OK

—

I put my phone down and climbed out the window so that no one would know that I was leaving. With my full potential, I flew towards the park at a high altitude so that people wouldn’t notice me. I landed behind a bush in the park and took a seat on the bench. The park was completely vacant, maybe because it’s 09:26 pm, I groaned looking at the time. I came here in just 3 minutes, gotta wait some more minutes for Peter to come. I was tapping my feet restlessly, checking the time almost every second. Seems foolish, but what am I supposed to do? I heard some sort of noise behind my back, like a buzzing sound. I turned back to see a drone. I instantly stood up horrified. It wasn’t a normal remote control drone, it was from my planet, the patterns engraved in its outer body clearly proved that. The drone flew and stopped in front of me, radiating a blue coloured light, and in a flash, a human hologram was displayed in front of my eyes.

“Jo…… Jonah?!?!” my tongue-tied, making me bereft of speech, seeing that figure standing in front of me.
“Seems like you were expecting someone else…” he puzzled, noticing me being not glad seeing his hologram.
“Ah… It’s just the first time I’ve seen you after a lot of years, so… it’s really g-great” I tried to develop a little fake smile.
“Is it so?!” He said, sounding unsatisfied by my words. I squinted my eyes and raised an eyebrow, trying to pretend that I was unable to understand what he was saying, which was not actually the case. I heard another sound behind the bushes, but I couldn’t see anyone there.
“I hope, you haven’t forgotten the tasks you were assigned to do?!” He questioned me diplomatically, making me look at his hologram again.
“Huh?! Uh..?! Wh-what are you trying to say?” I fretted, stammering at every word, fake giggling at the end of the sentence as I slid the ring into my jacket’s pocket hiding it from the view of his holographic cameras.

“The Queen has given you enough time already, I’m afraid she won’t give you any more. Why haven’t you contacted us, for 4 years?”

“My transponder broke when I came here, so I was unable to contact you” the only genuine thing I said till now to Jonah.
“But wait,… Queen?” I hesitated.
“Yes, Princess Dorothea is now the crowned Queen and she won’t be happy to know that you failed in getting the Ring!”

“I-I will try my best to get it really soon”

“Do it fast, because she’s coming to see you and you definitely don’t want to see their heads chopped”

“Yeah, Yeah, I will get it for her. Just ensure me you won’t hurt them”, I pleaded.

He didn’t reply and his holographic illusion turned off and that drone flew off.

She’s coming for me.
I’ll have to give Dorothea that Ring.

I felt some hustle in the bush behind me. I turned to see Peter. He removed his mask, walking towards me.
“Pe… ”
“What the hell was that Y/n? You lied?! You are working for that person, you said you were against?! ” He chastised. His voice was so loud, I had never heard him so rough. He was hell angry.
“I-I,… listen, Peter, I wanted to tell you, that’s why I called you and… ”
“Come on Y/n, what did you expect?! I was an idiot, I believed you before Fury or Dr Strange. I challenged them that you were right?!” He had tears in his eyes.
“Please Peter, I was trying to protect my planet.” I tried to explain.
“How? How are you protecting the planet by giving that Ring to HER?! Tell me the truth! The complete, whole truth!” He demanded, wearing his mask again.
“Okay,… I will tell you the truth, all of it” I responded, wearing the ring again, flying to a place devoid of any human interference and he too did swing to an abandoned building roof following me.

I was planning on explaining things to him calmly, but… It’s even worse.

That kiss with Peter replayed in my mind over and over again… I felt extremely restless, as I repeatedly tossed and turned around in my bed, squinting my eyes in the hope to sleep, but failed miserably.

The way his lips felt so soft on mine. The way his hands rested on my waist, pulling me closer. The taste of his lips. His soft curls falling on his face.
